title: Data Science Intern
description: Work on real-world data science projects impacting national policy. Responsibilities include data collection, cleaning, analysis, and visualization. Must have experience with Python (Pandas, Scikit-learn) and SQL.

title: Public Policy Research Intern
description: Assist in research and analysis of key policy issues facing India. The role involves literature reviews, report writing, and helping organize consultations. Ideal for students with a background in Economics or Political Science.

title: Cyber Security Intern
description: Join the team dedicated to protecting India's critical information infrastructure. You will work on vulnerability assessments, threat analysis, and developing security protocols. Strong foundation in networking required.

title: Web Development Intern (React)
description: Help develop and maintain public-facing portals and internal applications. This role requires proficiency in modern frontend technologies including React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS.

title: Agricultural Research Assistant
description: Support ongoing research projects in crop science and soil health. Fieldwork and lab assistance will be primary responsibilities. A background in agriculture or botany is preferred.

title: Public Health Campaign Intern
ministry: Ministry of Health and Family Welfare
description: Assist in creating and managing social media campaigns for national health initiatives. Requires strong communication skills and familiarity with social media platforms.

title: Economic Analysis Intern
description: Analyze macroeconomic trends and contribute to economic reports. Requires a strong quantitative background and familiarity with statistical software like R or Stata.

title: Environmental Policy Intern
description: Support the team working on climate change mitigation policies and international environmental agreements. A passion for environmental issues is a must.

title: Legal Research Intern
description: Assist in legal research, drafting notes, and preparing case summaries. Open to students currently enrolled in a recognized LLB or LLM program.

title: Content Development Intern (Education)
description: Develop e-learning content and educational materials for the DIKSHA platform. Requires creativity and strong writing skills in English or Hindi.

title: Cultural Diplomacy Intern
description: Assist in organizing cultural events and festivals that promote Indian heritage globally. A background in arts, history, or event management is beneficial.

title: Urban Planning Intern
ministry: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
description: Work on the Smart Cities Mission, contributing to data analysis, GIS mapping, and project monitoring. Background in architecture, civil engineering, or urban planning required.

title: Social Media Management Intern
description: Manage MyGov's social media channels, create engaging posts, and analyze performance metrics. Must be highly creative and social media savvy.

title: Aerospace Engineering Intern
description: A highly competitive internship for students to work alongside ISRO scientists on satellite and launch vehicle projects. Requires an excellent academic record in aerospace or mechanical engineering.

title: Statistical Analysis Intern
description: Work with large national datasets like NSSO surveys. Responsibilities include data cleaning, statistical modeling, and report generation.

title: Journalism & Media Intern
description: Gain hands-on experience in news reporting, video editing, and content creation for Doordarshan and All India Radio. For journalism and mass communication students.

title: Human Resources Intern
description: Assist in the modernization of HR policies for government employees. A great opportunity for MBA (HR) students to understand public sector HR.

title: Tourism Promotion Intern
description: Contribute to the 'Incredible India' campaign by creating digital content and researching new tourism circuits. A passion for travel and Indian culture is essential.

title: Renewable Energy Intern
ministry: Ministry of New and Renewable Energy
description: Work on projects related to solar and wind energy, including policy framework analysis and project viability assessments. For students in engineering or energy studies.

title: Supply Chain Management Intern
ministry: Ministry of Consumer Affairs, Food & PD
description: Analyze and help optimize the public distribution system (PDS). This role involves data analysis and logistics planning to improve food grain distribution across India.
